original_title: Die Sprache der Schatten - Friedrich Wilhelm Murnau und seine filme: Murnau - Die frühen Werke
overview: Documentary made in two parts by Luciano Berriatúa. This first part focuses on childhood, personal life and the early works in films by German director F.W. Murnau.
title: The Language of Shadows: Friedrich Wilhelm Murnau and His Films:  The Early Works
